import React from 'react' import '../Pages/styles/deviceInfo.css' import $ from 'jquery' const API = 'https://us-central1-castory-cases.cloudfunctions.net/getProduct/' class deviceInfo extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { quantity: 1, productInfo: { }, } } async componentDidMount() { const ID = this.props.match.params.id await fetch(API + ID) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => this.setState({productInfo: data, loading: false})) console.log(this.state.productInfo) setTimeout(()=> { const bg_navbar = document.querySelector(".bg-container"); bg_navbar.style.top = "0%" },1000) $("#card").html(`
/
CVV
*
See on GitHub
`) } render() { return(
